description: Lists running applications (process name, PID, path) and writes NDJSON summary + per-process records to the Active Response log using atomic overwrite with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: MaxWaitSeconds
script_parameters.description: Maximum time the script should allow for operations before considering a timeout.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
